languages.text: Влившийся в ряды обновленных Адептус Арбитес, Соломон сплотил вокруг себя часть арбитров — вместе они терроризировали целые планеты и потрошили семьи планетарных губернаторов в назидание каждому, кто хоть на йоту преступает закон. Новый маршал попытался пресечь творящуюся ересь, но в короткой схватке был повержен и отдан живьем на съедение Глейто. К тому времени, как Арбитес избрали нового командира, от их организации осталась лишь тень, а Соломон стал капитаном судна "Кровавая Дань". Корабль, несущий извращенное правосудие, спустя десятилетия сгинул в особо чудовищном варп-шторме — к вящему облегчению жителей Простора.
languages.translation_comment: Соломон еретик не стал маршалом, арбитров не разогнали
Соломон еретик не стал маршалом, арбитров не разогнали

languages.text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even one iota. The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.
languages.original_text: Влившийся в ряды обновленных Адептус Арбитес, Соломон сплотил вокруг себя часть арбитров — вместе они терроризировали целые планеты и потрошили семьи планетарных губернаторов в назидание каждому, кто хоть на йоту преступает закон. Новый маршал попытался пресечь творящуюся ересь, но в короткой схватке был повержен и отдан живьем на съедение Глейто. К тому времени, как Арбитес избрали нового командира, от их организации осталась лишь тень, а Соломон стал капитаном судна "Кровавая Дань". Корабль, несущий извращенное правосудие, спустя десятилетия сгинул в особо чудовищном варп-шторме — к вящему облегчению жителей Простора.

traits.locale_text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even an iota. The new marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the short fight resulted in him being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was but a shadow of its former self, and Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The ship was a bringer of perverse justice for decades, until it perished in an especially horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

The ship was a bringer of perverse justice for decades, until it perished in an especially horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

languages.text: Nachdem er sich den Rängen der reformierten Adeptus Arbites angeschlossen hatte, versammelte Solomorne einige Arbitratoren um sich. Gemeinsam terrorisierten sie ganze Welten und töteten die Familien von Planetengouverneuren als Lektion für alle, die das Gesetz auch nur minimal brachen. Der neue Marschall wollte dieser Ketzerei ein Ende bereiten, aber der daraus resultierende Kampf war kurz und endete damit, dass der Marschall überwältigt und von Glaito lebendig gefressen wurde. Als die Arbites dann einen neuen Anführer wählten, war ihre Organisation nur noch ein Schatten ihrer selbst. Mittlerweile war Solomorne Captain eines Schiffs geworden, der Blood Tribute. Es setzte seine pervertierte Gerechtigkeit noch Jahrzehnte durch, bis es schließlich in einem besonders starken Warpsturm unterging, sehr zur Erleichterung der Einwohner der Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even one iota. The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er sich den Rängen der reformierten Adeptus Arbites angeschlossen hatte, versammelte Solomorne einige Arbitratoren um sich. Gemeinsam terrorisierten sie ganze Welten und töteten die Familien von Planetengouverneuren als Lektion für alle, die das Gesetz auch nur minimal brachen. Der neue Marschall wollte dieser Ketzerei ein Ende bereiten, aber der daraus resultierende Kampf war kurz und endete damit, dass der Marschall überwältigt und von Glaito lebendig gefressen wurde. Als die Arbites dann einen neuen Anführer wählten, war ihre Organisation nur noch ein Schatten ihrer selbst. Mittlerweile war Solomorne Captain eines Schiffs geworden, der Blood Tribute. Es setzte seine pervertierte Gerechtigkeit noch Jahrzehnte durch, bis es schließlich in einem besonders starken Warpsturm unterging, sehr zur Erleichterung der Einwohner der Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Après avoir rejoint les rangs de l'Adeptus Arbites réformé, Solomorne rallia certains des arbitrators à sa cause. Ensemble, ils semèrent la terreur et éventrèrent des familles entières de gouverneurs pour dissuader quiconque d'enfreindre la loi ne serait-ce que d'un iota. Le nouveau maréchal tenta de mettre un terme à l'hérésie qui se propageait, mais le bref affrontement qui s'ensuivit se solda par une défaite cuisante, au terme de laquelle le maréchal fut donné en pâture à Glaito. Le temps que l'Arbites élise son nouveau chef, l'organisation n'était plus que l'ombre d'elle-même. Solomorne, quant à lui, devint capitaine d'un vaisseau appelé le Tribut de Sang, à bord duquel il continua à rendre sa justice perverse des décennies durant, jusqu'à ce qu'il s'échoue dans une tempête Warp d'une rare violence, au grand soulagement des habitants des Étendues.
languages.original_text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even one iota. The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir rejoint les rangs de l'Adeptus Arbites réformé, Solomorne rallia certains des arbitrators à sa cause. Ensemble, ils semèrent la terreur et éventrèrent des familles entières de gouverneurs pour dissuader quiconque d'enfreindre la loi ne serait-ce que d'un iota. Le nouveau maréchal tenta de mettre un terme à l'hérésie qui se propageait, mais le bref affrontement qui s'ensuivit se solda par une défaite cuisante, au terme de laquelle le maréchal fut donné en pâture à Glaito. Le temps que l'Arbites élise son nouveau chef, l'organisation n'était plus que l'ombre d'elle-même. Solomorne, quant à lui, devint capitaine d'un vaisseau appelé le Tribut de Sang, à bord duquel il continua à rendre sa justice perverse des décennies durant, jusqu'à ce qu'il s'échoue dans une tempête Warp d'une rare violence, au grand soulagement des habitants des Étendues.

languages.text: 索罗蒙对法务部进行改革之后，召集了几位追随他的法务官。他们前往众多世界，将当地行星总督与他们的全体家族成员当众开膛破肚，依靠恐怖手段震慑那些胆敢违背律法的犯罪分子。法务部的新任元帅打算制止如此猖獗的异端行为，但却在和索罗蒙的战斗中迅速落败，最终被格雷托活活咬死。当法务部再次选举出新任领袖时，法务部的实力已经远远不如当年。而在这段时间里，索罗蒙当上了舰长，指挥着他的座驾“鲜血之祭号”游荡在扩区之中。几十年间，这艘船一刻不停地行使着恐怖的正义，直到某次航行途中，它遭遇了极其恐怖的亚空间风暴，整艘船不知所踪，而整个科罗努斯扩区的居民也松了一大口气。
languages.original_text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even one iota. The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

索罗蒙对法务部进行改革之后，召集了几位追随他的法务官。他们前往众多世界，将当地行星总督与他们的全体家族成员当众开膛破肚，依靠恐怖手段震慑那些胆敢违背律法的犯罪分子。法务部的新任元帅打算制止如此猖獗的异端行为，但却在和索罗蒙的战斗中迅速落败，最终被格雷托活活咬死。当法务部再次选举出新任领袖时，法务部的实力已经远远不如当年。而在这段时间里，索罗蒙当上了舰长，指挥着他的座驾“鲜血之祭号”游荡在扩区之中。几十年间，这艘船一刻不停地行使着恐怖的正义，直到某次航行途中，它遭遇了极其恐怖的亚空间风暴，整艘船不知所踪，而整个科罗努斯扩区的居民也松了一大口气。

languages.text: Después de unirse a las filas de un Adeptus Arbites reformado, Solomorne reunió a algunos Arbitrator en torno a su persona. Juntos, sembraron el pánico en mundos enteros y destriparon a las familias de los gobernadores planetarios como advertencia para quienes osaran quebrantar la ley incluso lo más mínimo. El nuevo Mariscal intentó poner fin a esta salvaje herejía, pero el breve enfrentamiento que se desató resultó en el Mariscal derrotado y devorado vivo por Glaito. Para cuando el Arbites eligió a su nuevo líder, la organización era una sombra de su antiguo ser. Mientras tanto, Solomorne se había convertido en capitán de una nave llamada Tributo de Sangre. Con ella, continuó dispensando su perversa justicia durante décadas hasta su destrucción en una tormenta de disformidad particularmente espantosa, para alivio de los habitantes de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even one iota. The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Después de unirse a las filas de un Adeptus Arbites reformado, Solomorne reunió a algunos Arbitrator en torno a su persona. Juntos, sembraron el pánico en mundos enteros y destriparon a las familias de los gobernadores planetarios como advertencia para quienes osaran quebrantar la ley incluso lo más mínimo. El nuevo Mariscal intentó poner fin a esta salvaje herejía, pero el breve enfrentamiento que se desató resultó en el Mariscal derrotado y devorado vivo por Glaito. Para cuando el Arbites eligió a su nuevo líder, la organización era una sombra de su antiguo ser. Mientras tanto, Solomorne se había convertido en capitán de una nave llamada Tributo de Sangre. Con ella, continuó dispensando su perversa justicia durante décadas hasta su destrucción en una tormenta de disformidad particularmente espantosa, para alivio de los habitantes de la Extensión.

languages.text: 改組された高等裁定局の隊に加わった後、ソロモーンは幾人かのアービトレイターを率いて結束した。彼らは共に、法に一片でも違反する者への教訓として、惑星全体を恐怖に陥れ、惑星総督の家族を無残にも解体した。新たな将帥は蔓延する異端を終わらせようとしたが、その短い戦いで将帥は圧倒され、グライトに生きたまま食い殺されるという結末を迎えた。高等裁定局が新たな指導者を選ぶ頃には、組織はかつての面影をほとんど失っていた。一方で、ソロモーンはブラッド・トリビュートという船の船長となった。その船は何十年にもわたって彼の歪んだ正義を執行し続けたが、最終的には特に凄惨な〈歪み〉の嵐の中で沈没し、コロヌス・エクスパンスの住民たちに安堵をもたらした。
languages.original_text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even one iota. The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: 改組された高等裁定局の隊に加わった後、ソロモーンは幾人かのアービトレイターを率いて結束した。彼らは共に、法に一片でも違反する者への教訓として、惑星全体を恐怖に陥れ、惑星総督の家族を無残にも解体した。新たな将帥は蔓延する異端を終わらせようとしたが、その短い戦いで将帥は圧倒され、グライトに生きたまま食い殺されるという結末を迎えた。高等裁定局が新たな指導者を選ぶ頃には、組織はかつての面影をほとんど失っていた。一方で、ソロモーンはブラッド・トリビュートという船の船長となった。その船は何十年にもわたって彼の歪んだ正義を執行し続けたが、最終的には特に凄惨な〈歪み〉の嵐の中で沈没し、コロヌス・エクスパンスの住民たちに安堵をもたらした。

languages.text: Yeni bir düzene sahip olan Adeptus Arbites saflarına katılan Solomorne, bazı Yargıcıları etrafında topladı. Birlikte tüm dünyaya dehşet saldılar ve kanundan zerre sapan herkese ibret olması için gezegen valilerinin ailelerinin bağırsaklarını deştiler. Yeni Miralay her yeri saran sapkınlığa bir son vermeye çalıştı ancak bu teşebbüs, Miralay'ın Arbites karşısında yenik düşmesi ve Glatio'ya atılıp canlı canlı yenmesiyle sonuçlandı. Arbites yeni önderini seçtiğinde bu teşkilat, eski hâlinin bir gölgesinden ibaretti. Bu sırada Solomorne, Kanlı Aşar adlı bir geminin kaptanı oldu. Gemi fazlasıyla korkunç bir öteboyut fırtınasında nihayet yok olana kadar on yıllarca sapkın adaletini dağıtmaya devam etti. Bu sayede Enginlik sakinleri, rahat bir nefes alabilmiş oldu.
languages.original_text: After joining the ranks of the reformed Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rallied some of the Arbitrators around him. Together, they terrorised entire worlds and disembowelled planetary governors' families as a lesson to any who breached the law by even one iota. The new Marshal tried to put an end to the rampant heresy, but the brief fight that ensued resulted in the Marshal being overpowered and given to Glaito to be eaten alive. By the time the Arbites elected their new leader, their organisation was all but a shadow of its former self. Meanwhile, Solomorne had become captain of a ship, the Blood Tribute. The vessel would continue to dole out his perverse justice for decades, until it finally perished in a particularly horrific warp storm, much to the relief of the Expanse's inhabitants.

Arbites yeni önderini seçtiğinde bu teşkilat, eski hâlinin bir gölgesinden ibaretti. Bu sırada Solomorne, Kanlı Aşar adlı bir geminin kaptanı oldu. Gemi, fazlasıyla korkunç bir öteboyut fırtınasında nihayet yok olana kadar on yıllarca sapkın adaletini dağıtmaya devam etti. Bu sayede Enginlik sakinleri, rahat bir nefes alabilmiş oldu.
